text: Hristo Nikolov may refer to: * Hristo Nikolov-Choko (born 1939), Bulgarian footballer * Hristo Nikolov (footballer) (born 1980), Bulgarian footballer * Hristo Nikolov (basketball) (born 1985), Bulgarian basketball player * Hristo Nikolov (volleyball) (born 1990), Macedonian volleyball player
title: Hristo Nikolov
